post.body: that would be awesome dude, I will DM you
no, I use 3. Optus/Virgin 3G sucks balls.
7GB for $49 via 3.
picked up FIFA 08 for $20
there may not be many bargains, but there are many lulz
Internode or iiNet. There are no other options.
Phone line will be installed on 2nd of Jan. ADSL2 a week after that. So a few more weeks of 3G broadband at home. Argh.
Now on the bus home. I need water. I purchased an Xbox 360 game and extension cord. Amazing. At least Natalie got some useful stuff.
I swear this creepy guy is following Natalie and I around Highpoint. Every time I look up or turn around, he is there.
Too many people on the escalator - awaiting the Boxing Day 08 Highpoint Disaster. 31 killed, 76 injured.
Fucks sake people of Highpoint - how long does it take you to use an ATM?! It's not hard guys!
Sitting in the boyfriends and husband's seat while @natalietracy looks for handbags.
People fighting over pillows at Target. Someone is crying now.
Mayhem at Target. There is about 250 people lining up at 12 registers.
I'm not fussed about babies in burning prams. I'm comfortable with firebombing prams either way.
Okay, Highpoint is fucking packed. In other news, prams should be doused in petrol and set alight.
Listening to an old man explain to some asian teenager how he spent $10,000 at Harvey Norman.
Two 60 year old dudes walking around Sunshine with no shirts on. They look pretty buff for old guys.
On the bus to Highpoint.
Fucking tech support for luddite family on Christmas day is annoying.
